overview: Jon 141 founds himself stuck in a world of out-of-control reality TV. Every week, he has to fight for higher ratings and his life. But now, the network wants more viewers, and sleazy producer Quinton McBride knows just how to do it. By destroying Earth along with Jon 141. Will he be able to battle evil and save Earth at the same time?
tagline: It's the MATRIX Meets SURVIVOR With One Man Against The Monopolistic Media Gone Mad
title: Outlaw Prophet
